Central processor complex hardware components 41 Figure 2-21 View Hardware Configuration task on the Support Element Table 2-9 on page 42 lists the physical memory plugging configurations by feature code from manufacturing when the system is ordered. Consider the following points:  The CPC drawer columns for the specific feature contain the Memory Plug Drawer Configuration number
